entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0180 false positive (resulting in non-compilable code) #66427
    Backlog
  • Compilation fails when pattern matching and DoesNotReturnIf are combined #66426
  • [Enhancement] Generate code between functions is tabbed up to tab level #66424

PullRequests

Created

  • Instrumentation state #66429
  • Remove position argument that is already present in the syntax context #66428
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols in C# #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2088372 #66423

Merged

  • Delete Compilers.sln and keep only Compilers.slnf #65802
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Allow specifying expected IL verification baseline #66316
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add test showing incorrect sequence point placement #66363
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Allow multiple documents in method debug info #66359
    Area-Interactive, Pending director approval

Updated

  • Prototype of how to potentially add `using alias = type` to the language. #50167
    Area-Compilers
  • Adding keyword recommendations after FileKeyword #66357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Different behaviour of discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.6
  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix mismatched per-language option storages #66421
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure event handler generation and navigation in webforms works properly #66394
    Area-IDE
  • Fix reading VB editor options from ISettingsManager (17.4) #66398
    Area-IDE, Pending director approval
  • Ref safety visitor: replace GetVal and GetRef methods with CheckVal and CheckRef #66155
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix DateTime item's description in different culture #66420
    Area-IDE
  • Emit copy when calling non-readonly method with ref readonly field receiver #66351
    Area-Compilers
  • Nullable annotations for DebugInfoInjector, DynamicAnalysisInjector #66411
    Area-Compilers
